entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
